title: Average player salary in MLS by team 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Salary in thousand U.S. dollars for 23 number of Teams.
The Salary in thousand U.S. dollars is highest at Team Toronto FC and lowest at Team Houston Dynamo.
The maximum Team Toronto FC has got 4.62 times higher Salary in thousand U.S. dollars than the minimum Team Houston Dynamo.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Salary in thousand U.S. dollars for 23 number of Teams.
The Salary in thousand U.S. dollars is highest at Team Toronto FC and lowest at Team Houston Dynamo.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Salary in thousand U.S. dollars for 23 number of Teams.
The Salary in thousand U.S. dollars is highest at Team Toronto FC and lowest at Team Houston Dynamo.
The maximum Team Toronto FC has got 4.62 times higher Salary in thousand U.S. dollars than the minimum Team Houston Dynamo.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Team in the x axis and Salary in thousand U.S. dollars in the y axis.
Team Toronto FC has the highest Salary in thousand U.S. dollars and Houston Dynamo has the lowest Salary in thousand U.S. dollars.
Second maximum Salary in thousand U.S. dollars is found at Team LA Galaxy.
The minimum Team Houston Dynamo has got 4.62 times less Salary in thousand U.S. dollars than the maximum Team Toronto FC.
The Team Toronto FC has the highest Salary in thousand U.S. dollars, followed by LA Galaxy, and New York City FC. Down to the Team Houston Dynamo which is the lowest.
The highest value 902.41 at Toronto FC is almost 2.41 times larger than the average value 374.57.
The Salary in thousand U.S. dollars is 8615.02 if we add up values of all Teams.
